Package dataServices

Sample Java servlets demonstrating how to use the dalserver package.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
JhuProxyService JhuProxyService implements a demonstration SSAP service acting as a proxy to the JHU spectrum services, providing a reference SSAP implementation intended for software development purposes, e.g., to test client applications.
JhuProxyServlet HTTP servlet implementing a proxy SSAP service for the JHU spectrum services.
JhuSsapService JhuSsapService implements a demonstration SSAP service acting as a proxy to the JHU spectrum services, providing a reference SSAP implementation intended for software development purposes, e.g., to test client applications.
JhuSsapServlet HTTP servlet implementing a proxy SSAP service for the JHU spectrum services.
 

Package dataServices Description

Sample Java servlets demonstrating how to use the dalserver package.

This package contains several Java servlets which demonstrate how to use the dalserver package to implement working DAL services within a Java HTTP servlet environment.

Package Specification

  • Simple Spectral Access protocol
  • Simple Image Access protocol

Related Documentation

For overviews, tutorials, examples, guides, and tool documentation, please see:
  • IVOA Data Access Layer TWiki
